medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started this morning with subsequent episodes, including one episode of nausea/vomiting. This is the patient's third episode in the last 3 weeks. Pain occurs after eating each time, associated with nausea and diarrhea. Pain is described as cramping and subsides after not eating for a couple of hours.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Eczema, Asthma (Inhaler/neb prn), Depression/anxiety (Sees therapist, no meds), Headaches (Most days - ? tension), Scoliosis/scyphosis
medical_history.family_history: Father with unspecified condition, maternal grandfather with diabetes and CAD. No history of familial hyperlipidemia.
